item.title: @safiya reveals her love of Twilight, what itches her brain, and VidCon | YouTube Watch History
item.description: 『YouTube』 We love watching Safiya Nygaard’s videos, but what has SHE been watching?? Safiya sat down with us to plug in her phone and reveal her YouTube Watch History. From her favorite 4+hour video essay, to her love of Twilight, to creators she’s tried to track down at VidCon, Safiya talks about what she’s been watching and why! 0:00 - 0:23 Intro 0:23 - 2:30 Recent Videos 2:30 - 5:31 Scavenger Hunt 5:31 - 8:41 Scroll Roulette 8:41 - 10:12 Desert Island 10:12 Final Thoughts #SafiyaNygaard #WatchHistory #YouTube
